reviewText: purchased for a Christmas present for a guy who Loves trains. Was a big hit has watched  the video  several times in a row. Thanks

Excellent  well narrated footage of steam trains.  These videos are not copied from old film footage but rather appear to be more recent videos made specifically for this series.  High quality recordings and an excellent value and very worthwhile for steam train buffs.
Perfect, just as described.  Shipped immediately.
